overview: Three women, three queens crowned by failure and excess, are dying in a continuous party in which their miseries shine brighter than neon on their lonely nights.  Pepe Luis Pareja is a Spanish director (Granada). His films mix reality with the psychology of the characters, rising to dreamlike and surreal planes. Reinas has been to horror, experimental and non-narrative festivals in Berlin, Barcelona, ​​Madrid, Mexico, Stockholm and now with Film Madit 2.0 in Los Angeles. IG: pepe_luis_pareja & @chichinagranaina
title: Reinas
